name: Slot Games - TC Casino
description:

Subscribe today to receive:

-New Custom Slot Machines Every Month!
-We have professional slot machine designers who have been building slots for decades to bring the best new slots to you if you subscribe!
-All Slots Unlocked Build by a Professional Slot Designer

Subscription Terms-

**All Players get a 7 Day Free Trial with the option to Subscribe for as low as $.99 a month**

All Players get a 7 Day Free Trial with the option to Subscribe for $.99 a month - If you do not cancel your 7 day free trial it will automatically renew at $.99 per month. You can cancel anytime by going to your iTunes subscription preferences. If cancelled part way through your subscription - your balance will be forfeited.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

More Details on Subscriptions-
– TC Casino Subscriptions come in the following options - 7 Day Free Trial Which will renew to $.99 a month or a a larger subscruption that's up to $99/month
– Length of subscription is either 1 month or in 3 month cycles - each renew automatically unless turned off in iTunes
– Pricing of Subscriptions $.99 for 1 month bronze Plan & higher for other plans/
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase (If signed up for 7 day free trial you will be charged after the 7th day if you do not unsubscribe.)
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
-All subscriptions are Auto-Renewable and will renew until you cancel the subscription
– Links to Our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use are below
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
